Entries.Wed8: There aren't many out and proud queer folk in sports. I worry about that sometimes.$s#$e#When I go pro I want to be open about who I am, so queer kids can feel inspired.$0
Entries.Tue: The beach is a cool place to hang out and soak up some rays.#e#You gotta spend some time in the sun or else you'll get all pale.$0#$e#*Plus, everyone looks cute in a speedo or bikini.$4
Entries.summer_Tue: If my hair wasn't so popular with cute folk, I swear I'd shave it all off in a second.$0#$e#*sigh*... Life can be tough.$0

Entries.spring_8_1: I watched a film with Haley yesterday. It was about gay activists helping a mining town during a strike.$0#$e#I'm not normally one to sit down and watch a film, but it was good!$0
Entries.spring_8_2: I watched a film with Haley yesterday. It was about gay activists helping a mining town during a strike.$0#$e#I'm not normally one to sit down and watch a film, but it was good!$0
Entries.fall_8_1: Hey @. Did you catch the gridball game last night?$0#$e#The girl with the pink hair played really well, didn't she?And her interview afterwards... electrifying!$h
Entries.fall_8_2: Hey @. Did you catch the gridball game last night?$0#$e#The girl with the pink hair played really well, didn't she? And her interview afterwards... electrifying!$h
Entries.fall_22_1: Hey @. Did you catch the gridball game last night?$0#$e#The girl with the pink hair played really well, didn't she?And her interview afterwards... electrifying!$h
Entries.fall_22_2: Hey @. Did you catch the gridball game last night?$0#$e#The big bald commentator is an old player - one of the greats!#$e# He came out when he retired, and does a lot of work supporting children's charities.$h

Entries.Alex: What am I thankful for? I'm thankful that my grandparents accept me for who I am.^It might sound corny, but I love my grandma and grandpa.

Entries.winter_Fri8: Winter's always a bit melancholy for me.$s#$e#I used to visit my parents this time of year, but they asked me not to visit when I came out as bi.$s#$e#But I've found a new family here, who accept me as I am, so I'll be alright.$0
Entries.summer_Tue2: Hi @. Enjoying the weather?$0#$e#If the sun holds up, I might sit outside and read. My queer booklist grows longer by the day!$h

Entries.fall_Mon4: If you ever need trans-related healthcare, just come to me. Don't worry about the cost.$0#$e#I couldn't stand the thought of trans folk struggling to get healthcare here, so I lobbied Lewis to have it fully funded.$0
Entries.winter_6_1: I enjoy curling up with blankets and a good documentary this time of year.$0#$e#I watched one last night about one of the first trans folk in the Ferngill Airforce!$h
Entries.winter_6_2: I enjoy curling up with blankets and a good documentary this time of year.$0#$e#I watched one last night about one of the first trans folk in the Ferngill Airforce!$h

Entries.Harvey: I'm working up the courage to ask someone to dance with me.#$b#I wonder if Maru will be dancing with Penny this year...

Entries.Fri8: I shouldn't have said my sister was an attention grabbing scam. Sorry.$s#$e#It's just, when I came out my dad told me I broke his heart. When Maru came out, Demetrius made her cupcakes.$s#$e#It's just a bit difficult sometimes.$s
Entries.spring_26_1: Abigail's been bugging me about going to Pride next season.$0#$e#I fancy going to the one in Zuzu City, but she wants to stay local.$0
Entries.spring_26_2: Abigail's been bugging me about going to Pride next season.$0#$e#I fancy going to the one in Zuzu City, but she wants to stay local.$0
Entries.fall_Sat4: Maru had some scrap metal and enamel left over, so she made me some pride frog pins.$0#$e#I guess she can be thoughtful sometimes...$0

Entries.winter_10_1: I like Sam well enough, but I swear if he suggests another queer pun for the band name...$0
Entries.winter_10_2: I like Sam well enough, but I swear if he suggests another queer pun for the band name...$0

Entries.summer_Sun2: I keep seeing Gus out by the lake with a man from Grampleton.$0#$e#They look pretty close. Do you think they're dating?$0

Entries.Tue8: My ex used to get real weird about me being bi.$0#$e#Something about me running off with a girl...$7^Something about me running off with a guy...$7#$e#I think my ex was just insecure.$7
Entries.summerBeach: Hi @. I'm just sketching today.$0#$e#I'm kind of hoping to see a mermaid. They're so pretty, don't you think?$4

Entries.fall_Fri4: Hi @. Don't mind me, I'm just reading today. Elliott gave me some queer literature recommendations, so I'm giving some a go.
Entries.winter_Sun4: I like inviting Elliott over this season for tea and a chat.$0#$e#It was mainly so he wasn't shivering alone in his cabin, but I've come to like his opinions on queer literature.$h

Entries.winter_Tue6: Marnie's been teaching me how to quilt.$0#$e#She has a lovely bi pride quilt, and I'd love to make one myself.$h

Entries.Sat8: I'm so glad my dad accepts that I'm bi, but now he keeps insisting I keep the door open everytime I have someone in my room.$0#$e#I love him dearly, but there are some things my dad really does not need to know.$h

Entries.springHospital_Tue: Hi @. Sorry if I'm quiet, Harvey's asked me to put through the paperwork to get our trans healthcare fully funded again.$0
Entries.winter_Wed2: When it's particularly snowy, I bundle under blankets and watch an old sci-fi show with my dad.$0#$e#The latest episode is about two women in love who can't be together in their alien culture. I'm really enjoying it!$h

Entries.fall_Fri4: Penny always looks so sweet in the fall. Her red hair matches the autumn leaves just perfectly.$4

Entries.summer_Wed4: I like going swimming with Penny in the lake, but sometimes it's hard for her to come out.$0#$e#I wish there was a way for me to help with the dysphoria...$s

Entries.winter_Mon10: Apologies if I seem out of sorts today.$s#$e#I had a lover when I worked in the mines. Today's the anniversary of his death.$s#$e#Thanks for checking in with me, @. I miss him, sometimes.$s
Entries.spring_Thu4: There are so many TV programs nowadays.$0#$e$Evelyn's been watching one about drag performers with me.$0
Entries.summerTown: The weather reminds me of times gone by, where I would go out to Grampleton for the pride parade. Those were good times...
Entries.fall_Thu8: Alex doesn't think I know about the 'athletic' men's magazines under his bed.$0#$e#I'm just saying there are better men's magazines out there.$h
Entries.winter_Mon: I'm not feeling up to visitors today, @. Maybe you should come by tomorrow.
Entries.winter_1_1: Hope you have a good pair of winter boots, @. The ice can be nasty.
Entries.winter_1_2: Hope you have a good pair of winter boots, @. The ice can be nasty.
Entries.winter_15_1: Evelyn and I used to have ferocious snowball fights when we were young.$0#$e#Heh... Those were the days.$h
Entries.winter_15_2: Evelyn and I used to have ferocious snowball fights when we were young.$0#$e#Heh... Those were the days.$h
Entries.Wed10_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family now. You're such a nice young man, and I know you and Alex are in love.$h^You're part of the family, now. You're such a sweet young lass, I couldn't be more proud.$h
Entries.Wed_inlaw_Alex: Back when I was a youngster, two men couldn't get married. I'm glad to see that's changed.$h^You're part of the family, now. I'm glad that my grandson found such a nice wife.$h

Entries.Sat10: Don't tell anyone, but Lewis and I have been dating for a little while.$0#$e#It's the first time I've dated a man, so it's quite exciting!$h
Entries.summer_Wed2: I thought about decorating the goats with leis for the Pride season.$0#$e#But the goats just kept eating the flowers, so perhaps it's not a great idea...$0

Entries.fall_Thu2: Jas, Shane and I have rewatching one of our favourite TV series' recently.#$e#It's about a girl who finds a magical sword. Although Jas prefers her cat-like antagonist.#$e#

Entries.winter_Tue6: Hi @! Hope you're not too cold!$0#$e#Leah and I made pride flag quilts to keep out the chill - let me know if you want me to make you one too.$0

Entries.Marnie: *sigh*... Love is in the air... Perhaps this year I'll finally pluck up the courage to ask a lady or gent to dance.

Entries.Sat8: I'm glad to have you, Willy and Leah as friends, @.$0#$e#I was worried that there wouldn't be space for a flowery old fruit in this town, but you've all made this queer man feel very welcome.$h
Entries.spring_2_1: Ah, the springtime. All the spring may be hidden in the single bud...#$e#...and the low ground nest of the lark may hold the joy that is to herald the feet of many rose-red dawns.#$e#Sorry, I've been getting into a new book and can't stop quoting it.$h
Entries.spring_2_2: Ah, the springtime. All the spring may be hidden in the single bud...#$e#...and the low ground nest of the lark may hold the joy that is to herald the feet of many rose-red dawns.#$e#Sorry, I've been getting into a new book and can't stop quoting it.$h
Entries.summerSaloon: Hey @! Come join me.#$e#Let me tell you about his latest read. It's one about a stockbroker and a gameskeeper who fall in love in the 20th century...
Entries.winter_Fri4: We used to have a gay men's choir, back where I used to live. We always sung carols around this time of year.#$e#In the bleak mid-winter, frosty wind made moan...

Entries.spring_2_1: Ah, the springtime. All the spring may be hidden in the single bud...#$e#...and the low ground nest of the lark may hold the joy that is to herald the feet of many rose-red dawns.#$e#Sorry, I've been getting into a new book and can't stop quoting it.$h
Entries.spring_2_2: Ah, the springtime. All the spring may be hidden in the single bud...#$e#...and the low ground nest of the lark may hold the joy that is to herald the feet of many rose-red dawns.#$e#Sorry, I've been getting into a new book and can't stop quoting it.$h
Entries.summerSaloon: Hey @! Come join me.#$e#Let me tell you about his latest read. It's one about a stockbroker and a gameskeeper who fall in love in the 20th century...

Entries.fall_Wed4: I've seen Penny admiring Maru a lot recently.#$e#To quote an old poet, she would much prefer to see the lovely way she walks and the radiant glance of her face...

Entries.Thu6: Harvey's found me a queer-friendly therapist in Zuzu City, and it's really been helping.#$e#Our community struggles with addiction, but I want to get better and I'm glad to have someone who understands.

Entries.summer_Sun4: One of my favourite treats is a pizza, with blue cheese, yellow pineapple and pink ham, cooked in a cast iron skillet.$0#$e#You could say it's a PAN-fried pizza...$e
Entries.fall_Sat6: We have a bonded pair of hens out back, and they often feed each other corn. It's quite sweet.$0#$e#One's a gentle giant, but the other will fight anything that comes near them!$h#$e#Including my hands...$h
Entries.winter_Mon6: Hi @. Has Marnie tried to foist a quilt on you yet?$0#$e#I have one pan flag and one rainbow quilt, but she's insisting I get another this year.$h

Entries.spring_24_1: Emily's been trying to rope me into lei-making for an upcoming Pride event.#$e#I've never even darned a button, so I'm not sure what she's expecting.
Entries.spring_24_2: Emily's been trying to rope me into lei-making for an upcoming Pride event.#$e#I've never even darned a button, so I'm not sure what she's expecting.
Entries.fall_Sat6: We have a bonded pair of hens out back, and they often feed each other corn. It's quite sweet.$0#$e#One's a gentle giant, but the other will fight anything that comes near them!$h#$e#Including my hands...$h

Entries.Abigail: I once took a girl out in the rain so I could kiss her like in the movies.$0#$e#It wasn't that romantic. Plus, she gave me the flu.$0

Entries.spring_Mon4: I learnt tarot from an old girlfriend. Here, let me do a reading for you, @...$0#$e#...The Hermit! Maybe you should get out more.$h
Entries.summer_Fri8: My parents used to drag me out of town to visit my grandmother for barbecue around this time.$5#$e#I hated going, because she never let any of my boyfriends or girlfriends come along.$5#$e#Well, the old witch is dead now, so I can bring whoever I like to barbecue.$h
Entries.Fall_Wed4: Hey @! What do you call a queer witch?$0#$e#Pan-hex-ual...$h

Entries.winter_19_1: There was a horror film on last night, where a couple end up trapped in a mansion with a scientist building his own muscle man.$0#$e#Sebastian and I watch it every winter.$0
Entries.winter_19_2: There was a horror film on last night, where a couple end up trapped in a mansion with a scientist building his own muscle man.$0#$e#Sebastian and I watch it every winter.$0

Entries.fall_Tue4: I used to have a girlfriend who would not stop buying pumpkin spice everything this season.$0#$e#I like a good pumpkin spice latte, but seriously? Everything?!$3
Entries.winter_Wed2: It's hard to be fashionable in a big winter parka, but winter's all about living in your lover's oversized sweater.#$e#It's sweater weather!$h

Entries.spring_27_1: Emily and Shane have spent the past week making leis for Pride next summer.$0#$e#I can't take one step inside my house without getting flowers between my toes!$0
Entries.spring_27_2: Emily and Shane have spent the past week making leis for Pride next summer.$0#$e#I can't take one step inside my house without getting flowers between my toes!$0

Entries.Tue8: Emily and I are polar opposites, but you bet I won't let anyone hurt her!$0#$e#She didn't look like a typical girl, didn't go through typical puberty, so she attracted bullies.$5#$e#I got in sooo much trouble as a kid when I punched them out!$h

Entries.summer_Wed6: I normally bring Alex iced coffee when he works the ice cream store.#$e#It's gay culture... or maybe it's the liters of sugar syrup.

Entries.Fri8: It took me a while to accept my sexuality. I didn't come from a time where it was acceptable.#$e#But it's gotten much better. A community of folk like me have formed here, and I couldn't be happier.$h
Entries.fall_Sat6: A group of us older queer folk come together once or twice a week for tea and cake, and for a bit of a gossip.#$e#We've come to call ourselves 'Friends of Dorothy'.$h
Entries.winter_Thu: An old boyfriend of mine used to take me skating on the pond in the forest when I was a young man.$0#$e#I think I'm a bit too old to get my skates on now...$s

Entries.spring_Wed2: Hi @. How's the farm going?$0#$e#I've been busy planning this year's Pride event!$h

Entries.summer_Thu4: I've noticed Gus visiting the lakes a lot recently, armed with a bottle of wine and a picnic basket.$0#$e#Sounds like someone's starting a summer romance...$h

Entries.Tue8: I get worried about dating as an ace person.$2#$e#What if they ask for something I'm not comfortable with?$4#$e#I guess there's gotta be someone out there who accepts me for me...$2
Entries.spring_Fri4: I like listening to the blues, particularly songs with A minor chords.$0#$e#In other words, the songs are ACE...$h
Entries.summer_Tue2: Emily brought me over some rainbow succulents to try growing on the window.#$e#She says it's 'queer culture', but I just think she wants me to have plants I can't kill.
Entries.fall_Thu4: Lewis has been inviting me for tea with other older queer folk in the town.#$e#I'm not the most sociable of men, but I might take him up on the invite...

Entries.Clint: I haven't got family to celebrate with.#$b#But I do have a queer community here, and that makes me feel less lonesome.

Entries.spring_Mon4: It's finally spring. Flowers are in bloom, romance is in the air...$0#$e#...not really. It's just pollen for me.$h
Entries.fall_Thu6: Have you seen the kingfishers? They're courting this season.#$e#That's the closest I'd like to be to a romance, honestly.
Entries.Fri8: Folk keep suggesting I settle down with someone. But it's not really my thing.#$e#I don't enjoy romance, nor dating. I like being out here, with the natural world.

Entries.winterBathHouse_Thu: The Wizard and I met at a trans-friendly pagan commune when we were youngsters.$0#$e#It was over in Castle Village. I hear it's still going well.

Entries.summer_Sun4: I've seen Gus bringing a guy for picnics by the lake this summer.$0#$e#I think he's trying to keep it quiet though, so don't tell anyone. Okay?$0

Entries.spring_Sun6: I pray regularly, but honestly, the church is a little uncomfortable.$s#$e#The church hasn't always been welcoming to queer families like mine.$s
Entries.fall_Sun8: I came out as nonbinary as a teen, but when I got pregnant with Sam, some folk told me to climb back in the closet and just be a woman.$s#$e#They were wrong. We're a queer family, and I want to be proud of that.

Entries.spring_Sat2: Sometimes I take Vincent to Zuzu City for new clothes.$0#$e#He looks so cute in the dresses!

Entries.winter_Mon4: I think I might get Sam a new binder for the Feast of the Winter Star. What do you think, @?

Entries.summer_Mon4: Summer's here... and that means I have to struggle with finding trans-appropriate swimwear for me and the boys. Sigh.

Entries.Thu8: Being nonbinary never really affected me while working the fishing boat, so I didn't really talk about it.#$e#No-one can tell your gender in a big set of waders, anyhow.$h
Entries.spring_23_1: I'm still choosing between a suit and tie and a shirt and skirt for the Flower Dance.
Entries.spring_23_2: I'm still choosing between a suit and tie and a shirt and skirt for the Flower Dance.
Entries.summer_Fri6: Back home, when the boats were pulled in to the inner reefs for summer fishing, the sailors used to run drag contests on shore every month.$0#$e#Of course I took part. I was the best gal those men ever did see!$h

Entries.fall_Thu4: Nice to see you out, @. Any plans for today?#$e#I think I might see Lewis and the other bears tonight, just for a chat.

Entries.winter_Wed2: I've been visiting Elliot some evenings, so he's not all by his lonesome in the colder season.#$e#I bring him Tom Kha Soup, and he reads me queer poetry that he's found.#$e#It's a good exchange.$h

Entries.fall_11.001: I'm a healthy boy, doc. Can I get stabbed with T and go now? This is boring.

Entries.spring_Tue4: Penny and I are really good friends. It's nice to have someone who understands what being trans is like.

Entries.Sun6: Did you know I got my first binder from Joja?$0#$e#It was kind of crappy... Mom insists I buy better ones from a place in Zuzu City now.$0
Entries.summer_Wed4: You get so sweaty wearing a binder in summer.$s#$e#Would it be uncool if I borrowed my mom's talcum powder?$0

Entries.winter_10_1: I've been trying to convince Sebastian to call our band the Bi-tles or Pan-gea.$0#$e#I don't think he's biting, though.
Entries.winter_10_2: I've been trying to convince Sebastian to call our band the Bi-tles or Pan-gea.$0#$e#I don't think he's biting, though.
Entries.fall_Sat8: It's been three years since I transitioned, and still my older relatives send greetings cards in my deadname.$4 At least at family gatherings, Vincent pretends he doesn't know that name and winds the transphobes up, which is hilarious.$h

Entries.Sat8: I'm glad my hormones are fully funded through Harvey's clinic. I don't think Mom and I could afford it otherwise...$s
Entries.summer_Tue6: Maru wants to go swimming in the lake this summer. I don't know...$0#$e#It'll depend how my dysphoria is, I think.$s
Entries.winter_Mon2: We don't have much, but I'm glad for whatever my Mom can give at the Feast of the Winter Star.$0#$e#The year I came out, she got me the most beautiful dress - I was so happy I cried!$h

Entries.fall_Sat4: Don't you think Maru looks handsome today?$0#$e#The autumn sunlight really brings out her freckles...$4

Entries.spring_Tue4: I like Sam. Sure, he's a bit of a troublemaker, but he gets what it's like to be trans like me, you know?

Entries.spring_Tue8: I built the Shrine of Illusions specifically for my transition.$0When the mundane doctors wouldn't offer me what I needed, I called on the arcane.
Entries.summer_Fri8: I transitioned when I was still married to my ex-wife.#$e#It made the relationship... complicated.
Entries.fall_Mon6: Before I became master of the occult, I lived in a commune, where I met Linus.$0#$e#He was the first to accept me as a transgender man.$0
Entries.winter_Sat4: The forest spirits hold very different concepts to us on all matter of things. Life, death, love, gender...#$e#It's refreshing to work with them.

Entries.summer_Wed: I used some pink strawberries, gold bananas and blueberries to make a cooked breakfast this morning.$0#$e#Clearly I made PAN-cakes...$h
Entries.spring_20_1: Hi @. Will you be going to Pride this year?#$e#I've been trying to rope Shane into helping me with pride leis.
Entries.spring_20_2: Hi @. Will you be going to Pride this year?#$e#I've been trying to rope Shane into helping me with pride leis.
Entries.Thu8: It may look like we don't get on, but I know Haley will likely kill for me if she needed to.$0#$e#At my first Pride in Zuzu City, she very nearly broke a bigot's arm because he tried to approach me!$h

Entries.fall_12_1: Sandy's got herself heartbroken over a girl again. I'm going to pop round next week with a bottle of wine to cheer her up.
Entries.fall_12_2: Sandy's got herself heartbroken over a girl again. I'm going to pop round next week with a bottle of wine to cheer her up.

Entries.winter_Fri4: Sometimes Abigail and I meet up to discuss crystals and magic.$0#$e#We might be starting a queer witch coven here in the valley!$h

Entries.winter_11.001: Being an intersex kid, I had way too many visits to the doctors. I'm a bit nervous...$s

Entries.summerSaloon8: Alright, I'll admit it... Maybe I have been seeing a man by the lake this summer.$h#$e#Even old bears like me should have a summer romance!$h
Entries.springSaloonThu: Hiya @. Ready for Pride next month?
Entries.summerSaloon4: A visit to the lake would be mighty nice for a couple, don't you think?#$e#Not that I'm asking for any particular reason...$2
Entries.winter_Sat6: Winter can be tough on many folk in the gay community.#$e#I always like to keep a door open in case any troubled soul needs a shoulder to cry on...

Entries.springSaloonThu: Hiya @. Ready for Pride next month?
Entries.winter_Sat6: Winter can be tough on many folk in the gay community.#$e#I always like to keep a door open in case any troubled soul needs a shoulder to cry on...

Entries.fallSaloon_Tue: Don't you think Penny and Maru look sweet together?#$e#They might be oblivious, but this old bear has eyes...$h

Entries.Mon8: It's hard being gay out here, @.$2#$e#You don't tend to get many girls coming to the desert.$2#$e#There's always online dating, though!
Entries.spring_27_1: Emily's been sending over photos of all her beautiful Pride leis. I can't wait to go over and see them in person!$h
Entries.spring_27_2: Emily's been sending over photos of all her beautiful Pride leis. I can't wait to go over and see them in person!$h
Entries.summer_Wed4: Hi, @!~ I watched my favourite film again last night - let me tell you about it!$h#$e#It was about two queens and a trans woman travelling across a desert...$h
Entries.fall_Mon2: Hi!~ Did you see the bikers on your way in?#$e#They were the Grampleton Bullydykes - an all female bikers club! Oh, I'm coming over all a-flutter just thinking about them...$h
Entries.fall_12_1: Sorry if I'm a bit down today, @.$s#$e#A girl I've been seeing just broke up with me.$s
Sorry if I'm a bit down today, @.$s#$e#A girl I've been seeing just broke up with me.$s

Entries.winter_Tue6: Emily often jokes that cacti are gay culture, and that Calico Desert is therefore the queer homeland.$h#$e#Hey, maybe you should take some cacti back for your friends!$h

Entries.Fri8: Sebastian's father wasn't great about him being bi, and I didn't really stand up for him back then.$2#$e#I'm trying to make up for that, and to be a better mom to him.$5

Entries.spring_Mon2: I made the mistake of asking my kids if they wanted me to make them anything.$h#$e#Both of them asked for a ca-BI-net...$4

Entries.summer_Thu: Hey @. Need anything new? A new chair, perhaps?#$e#I can make it rainbow coloured if you ask nicely...$h

Entries.fall_Tue4: Do you think Penny and Maru are...?$0#$e#I can't tell if it's a crush or if something's changed between them.$h

Entries.Robin: Hiya, @. You're welcome to join our family table if you need company.$0#$b#I know it can be isolating for queer folk this time of year.$0

Entries.spring_22_1: Business has been good this past week. Emily's been bulk-ordering silks and coloured fabrics for her Pride leis.
Entries.spring_22_2: Business has been good this past week. Emily's been bulk-ordering silks and coloured fabrics for her Pride leis.
Entries.summer_Tue2: I've been thinking I might start selling Pride merch at the store...$0#$e#Hey, I'm not adverse to capitalizing on the pink pound here!$h

Entries.Sun8: Caroline and I are no strangers to a protest or march. We attended the first Pride here, you see.$0#$e#I like to think I've settled down in my middle age, but Caroline... well, its hard to keep her away from a riot.$h

Entries.winter_Sat4: I do worry about Abigail's interests somedays.$s#$e#I'm no stranger to an 'alternative' lifestyle, but I think she's leaning into the 'queer witch' aesthetic a little too hard...

Entries.Pierre: The rainbow coloured jellies remind me of all the pride flags from the marches Caroline and I have attended...$h

Entries.fall_Thu4: Penny's been mooning over that young lass from the mountains for a week straight.#$e#I suggested she ask her for a drink at the Saloon, but she got flustered and bolted to her room!$h

Entries.spring_Fri4: When we lived in Zuzu City, there was an old drag bar I used to go to.#$e#It was always such a hoot!$h
Entries.summerSaloon_Sat: When I'm hungover, I like putting on foreign-language films.#$e#Did you ever catch that film about the clothing mangate's daughter and her secret girl? Penny liked that one.

Entries.Thu8: Penny's happiness means everything to me. Even if her HRT wasn't funded, I would scrape together what I had to make sure she got what she needed.$0#$e#I'll also fight who I need to so she doesn't get hurt, so you best treat her kindly, you hear?!$0

Entries.winter_Wed6: Gus likes to keep his door open for neghbours who are struggling this season. But I like to check in on him as well.#$e#Even for someone as jovial as him, it can be hard for gay men in the winter. While Gus looks out for other folk, I look out for Gus.

Entries.winter_Thu8: My husband wasn't always such a stick-in-the-mud.$0#$e#He once punched out a policeman to defend my honour at a Pride protest!$h#$e#I was flattered, even though I ended up paying his bail.

Entries.fall_Tue4: Hey @. How's it going?#$e#On long autumn evenings, I go over to Jodi's when the kids are in bed to chat.#$e#Being a non-binary parent is hard on her.

Entries.summer_Sun4: I read a wonderful book in my sunroom the other day.#$e#It was about a detransitioned trans person wanting to raise a kid with their lover and their ex-partner. It got me thinking for days!

Entries.spring_Mon2: Abby offered to read my tarot this morning. She said my card for the day was 'Judgement'.#$e# I think maybe she's taking this 'queer witch' thing too seriously...

Entries.fall_Tue6: I've seen Maru looking at that girl from the trailer south of here.$3#$e# Do I need to be having words with her or...?$4

Entries.spring_Thu2: I've been thinking about going down to the beach and looking at the corals.#$e#I hear there's someone working on creating 'super corals' that are more resistant to climate change!
Entries.summer_Thu2: Maybe one of these days I'll go out to the desert and take a look at the native fauna.#$e#I've been reading papers from a woman who's an expert in arachnids, and I'm curious to test her findings on spiders and scorpions in the field.

Entries.winter_Fri2: I found a book on queer pioneers in computing while shopping online. I think I might gift it to Sebastian this Feast of the Winter Star...

Entries.Wed8: I like to teach Maru about the queer scientists that came before her.#$e#I think it's important to be able to see people like you in the work that you do.

Entries.spring_Fri4: Do you watch the television much?$0#$e#George and I have been watching a show about drag performers recently. It's quite entertaining!$h
Entries.summer_Fri2: Around this time of year, Grampleton hosts its own Pride.#$e#If I could still travel that far, I'd love to see it again.

Entries.winter_Mon10: When we were younger, George used to have another partner in our relationship. I fully consented, of course.$0#$e#He died of an illness on this day several decades back.$s#$e#George tends to get upset this time of year, so maybe you should check in on him.
Entries.winter_1_1: Be careful you don't slip on the ice, dear.
Entries.winter_1_2: Be careful you don't slip on the ice, dear.
Entries.winter_15_2: Be careful you don't slip on the ice, dear.
Be careful you don't slip on the ice, dear.
Entries.winter_Mon: George tends to be quite melancholy this time of year.$s#$e#I like to give him a litte extra care and attention to cheer him up.$0

Entries.fall_Fri6: Around this time a few years ago, Alex introduced his boyfriend to us.$0#$e#He was so nervous! They didn't last long, but I'm glad he was happy for a time.$h

Entries.Mon8: Don't tell anyone... But Mayor Lewis has been around for tea many times.#$e#Marnie only ever brought girls before. It's a bit weird.

Entries.winter_Thu6: I know Vincent wants to marry Miss Penny when he's older, but I think Miss Penny wants to marry Miss Maru!$4#$e#She gets all blushy when I say it, though.$4

Entries.spring_17_1: Shane brought me a lei to where at Pride this year!$h
Entries.spring_17_2: Shane brought me a lei to where at Pride this year!$h
Entries.summer_Wed6: Sometimes Shane paints his nails to match the moonlit jellies that come this season.#$e#I wonder if he'll do mine this year?
Entries.fall_Thu4: Last night I watched my favourite cartoon.#$e# The magic sword lady and the cat lady kissed in it!$h

Entries.fall_Wed4: I want to be a princess this Spirit's Eve! No, wait, a ghost! Or maybe a tiger!
Entries.winter_Sat6: Miss Penny asked us to draw what we wanted for Winter Star at class today.$0#$e#I drew a pretty skirt, and she said she had one just like it!$h

Entries.spring_11_2: Look! Dad did my nails today ready for the egg hunt!$h

Entries.Thu8: I don't remember Sam as my sister, so it's weird when people call him the wrong name.#$e#I don't like it when they do that. He gets mad about it.$s

Entries.summerBeach: Sam doesn't really take his shirt off at the beach. He says he can't, but other boys can?

Entries.winter_Fri6: The military wasn't all sunshine and roses.$2#$e#They had a 'Don't Ask, Don't Tell' policy. Some of my comrades died, and their partners had no rights to military pensions or benefits.$3#$e#I make sure to donate my Winter Star holiday bonus to a charity that supports those affected.$0

Entries.fall_Sun6: I know Jodi gets a bit uncomfortable at the church. But in my opinion, Yoba doesn't care that we're a queer family.
Entries.summer_17_2: Today's the anniversary of the day Jodi and I started dating.$h#$e#She came out to me as nonbinary not long after. It took a bit of discussion to make sure I used the correct pronouns and terminology for her.$0#$e#I might make her a Rhubarb Pie to show how much I care...$h

Entries.Tue8: I went overseas before Sam transitioned, so coming back to see him after two or three years on hormones has been a bit of a surprise.$0#$e#He's grown handsome though, hasn't he? I'm proud of him.$h

Entries.spring_11_2: Vincent asked me to paint his nails today, ready for the Egg festival.$0#$e#My hand's not as steady as Jodi's, but I think I did a good job.$h
